price: Então, não sabe ele que será recompensado, quando for revolvido o que há nos sepulcros,
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
